scenario.name: Test call declination on SRTP offer where it is not enabled
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:echo@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: test1 <sip:bob@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: test <sip:test@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:test@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Test User-Agent: Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=guest1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 6002 RTP/SAVP 0 a=crypto:1 AES_CM_128_HMAC_SHA1_32 inline:WbTBosdVUZqEb6Htqhn+m3z7wUh4RJVR8nE15GbN a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000
